title: Authentication Error Message Gets Clear Upgrade

topics.title: Error Message Corrections
topics.summary: A recent fix addressed an incorrect authentication error message that was misleading users. The update clarifies the distinction between unauthorized access and server errors, improving the overall user experience during authentication.

topics.title: Session Management Improvements
topics.summary: Recent updates have improved session management by storing return URLs in the session instead of cookies. This change enhances user experience and security by ensuring that sensitive data is not stored in less secure locations.

topics.title: UI Enhancements for Mobile
topics.summary: Several pull requests have focused on improving the user interface for mobile devices. Notable changes include preventing modals from taking full width on mobile screens, enhancing usability and aesthetics for mobile users.

topics.title: Loading Effects for Data Presentation
topics.summary: An enhancement was made to the loading effects for package data, ensuring a smoother user experience. The addition of loading indicators for 'like' data prevents abrupt changes and improves visual feedback during data retrieval.

topics.title: Documentation and Platform Updates
topics.summary: The documentation has been updated to remove Gitpod as a playground platform due to its rebranding to Ona, which is now more enterprise-focused. This reflects a shift in available tools for developers and suggests alternatives.

topics.title: Package Page Improvements
topics.summary: Improvements to the package page skeleton loading state have been implemented, enhancing the initial loading experience for users. This change aims to provide a more polished and responsive interface while users wait for content to load.
